author: odoo
code:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-


{
    'name': 'Transifex integration',
    'version': '1.0',
    'summary': 'Add a link to edit a translation in Transifex',
    'category': 'Extra Tools',
    'description':
    """
Transifex integration
=====================
This module will add a link to the Transifex project in the translation view.
The purpose of this module is to speed up translations of the main modules.

To work, Odoo uses Transifex configuration files `.tx/config` to detec the
project source. Custom modules will not be translated (as not published on
the main Transifex project).

The language the user tries to translate must be activated on the Transifex
project.
        """,
    'data': [
        'data/transifex_data.xml',
        'data/ir_translation_view.xml',
    ],
    'depends': ['base'],
}
comments: transifex integration                       this module add link transifex project translation view  the purpose module speed translations main modules   to work  odoo uses transifex configuration files   tx config  detec project source  custom modules translated (as published main transifex project)   the language user tries translate must activated transifex project                     coding  utf 8        part odoo  see license file full copyright licensing details
content:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# Part of Odoo. See LICENSE file for full copyright and licensing details.

{
    'name': 'Transifex integration',
    'version': '1.0',
    'summary': 'Add a link to edit a translation in Transifex',
    'category': 'Extra Tools',
    'description':
    """
Transifex integration
=====================
This module will add a link to the Transifex project in the translation view.
The purpose of this module is to speed up translations of the main modules.

To work, Odoo uses Transifex configuration files `.tx/config` to detec the
project source. Custom modules will not be translated (as not published on
the main Transifex project).

The language the user tries to translate must be activated on the Transifex
project.
        """,
    'data': [
        'data/transifex_data.xml',
        'data/ir_translation_view.xml',
    ],
    'depends': ['base'],
}
description: Odoo. Open Source Apps To Grow Your Business.
